generated_text:
{
    "name": "Garlic Parmesan Pasta",
    "recipe": {
        "title": "Garlic Parmesan Pasta",
        "serving_size": 4,
        "ingredients": {
            "Garlic": "4 cloves, minced",
            "Parmesan": "1 cup, grated",
            "Butter": "4 tbsp",
            "Olive Oil": "2 tbsp",
            "Pasta": "8 oz (Angel Hair Pasta)",
            "Milk": "1 cup",
            "Table Salt": "1 tsp",
            "Pepper": "1/2 tsp"
        },
        "cook": [
            "Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.",
            "In a large skillet, melt 2 tbsp of butter with 1 tbsp of olive oil over medium heat.",
            "Add minced garlic to the skillet and sauté for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.",
            "Pour in the milk and bring to a simmer.",
            "Stir in grated Parmesan cheese, remaining butter, salt, and pepper. Cook until the cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth.",
            "Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to coat evenly with the sauce.",
            "Serve hot, garnished with additional Parmesan cheese and freshly chopped parsley if desired."
        ]
    }
}
